summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Beskar IT website. Backend APIs working correctly, frontend loads and functions well, but contact form integration fails due to missing backend URL configuration.

integration_issues.issue: Frontend cannot communicate with backend - REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL is empty in .env file
integration_issues.error_message: Unable to send message. Please try again later.

passed_tests: Frontend homepage loads with all sections
Navigation links work with smooth scrolling
Hero section shows correct tagline 'This is the way'
Products section displays Nexus and OSINT cards
Services section shows compliance frameworks (ISO 27001, ISO 42001, GDPR, HIPAA, etc.)
Impact stats section displays 70%+, 30%, 100% stats with animations
Contact form fields are accessible and can be filled
Hero CTA buttons are clickable and functional
All sections visible and properly laid out on mobile
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Configure REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL in /app/frontend/.env file to enable frontend-backend communication. The backend is working correctly but frontend cannot reach it due to empty backend URL configuration.
